title: Looking for girls for a competitive team ♥
body:
Hey pals, 

I'm looking to create a team of girls to compete in some of the random tournaments held by various online communities around OCE :) 
We would be looking to practice in some organized scrims as well as playing and improving together in flex queue. For this reason, it is preferable that you have a flex rank of at least gold (lower flex ranks will be considered on a case by case basis depending on soloq rank).

Please copy and paste the application and paste it along with your answers in the comments if you are keen to apply:

-Preferred Role
-Peak rank
-Rank as of now
-Top 3 champs
-Strengths
-Weaknesses
-Any reason for joining?
-Other information

Any questions, leave them below or feel free to add "Yaiamone" in game ♥
